price: O Allah ki, göklerde ve yerde ne varsa hepsi O’nundur. Şiddetli azaptan dolayı kâfirlerin vay haline!
arabic: ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٍ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wawaylun lil'kāfirīna min ʿadhābin shadīdin
